oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Added value from working together
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Niggli, Urs
Alföldi, Thomas
Willer, Helga
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Research methodology and philosophy
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: During the meeting the eight new transnational research projects were presented and potential benefits and constraints of transnational research cooperations in organic food and farming through an ERANET were discussed. Furthermore, the outputs, findings and the "lessons learned" during the 3-year period of the ERA-NET project CORE Organic were presented and discussed.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Niggli, Urs; Alföldi, Thomas and Willer, Helga (2007) Added value from working together. Paper at: CORE Organic meeting, Vienna, 13-14 September 2007 .
